long_description: Incredibly lightweight and packable, the women's Marmot Minimalist Rain Pants tuck away into your backpack or luggage for protection when you need it most. GORE-TEX(R) PacLite(R) is waterproof, windproof and breathable and built for activities where weight and space are critical, but durable protection is still important. Ankle zips ease pants on and off over boots. Articulated knees offer a comfortable fit and freedom of movement. Elastic waist has snap closure and zip fly. Marmot Minimalist Rain Pants for women feature hand pockets with water-resistant zippers.
short_description: Incredibly lightweight and packable, the women's Marmot Minimalist Rain Pants tuck away into your backpack or luggage for protection when you need it most.
